acts.what: AATT with HTML CodeSniffer WCAG 2.1 AA ruleset

result.msg: This element has "position: fixed". This may require scrolling in two dimensions, which is considered a failure of this Success Criterion.
This element is absolutely positioned and the background color can not be determined. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the background are at least 4.5:1.
This element has "position: fixed". This may require scrolling in two dimensions, which is considered a failure of this Success Criterion.
This element's text is placed on a background image. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the image are at least 4.5:1.

Accessible name for this element does not contain the visible label text. Check that for user interface components with labels that include text or images of text, the name contains the text that is presented visually.
Check that this element has an inherited foreground colour to complement the corresponding inline background colour or image.

The heading structure is not logically nested. This h3 element should be an h2 to be properly nested.

This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.64:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #9187f4.
If this element contains a navigation section, it is recommended that it be marked up as a list.
